text.div:
Invasive Pneumococcal Disease (Tests for Streptococcus pneumoniae in Specimen from Normally Sterile Site by Culture and Identification Method)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    85768-0 Streptococcus pneumoniae DNA [Presence] by NAA with non-probe detection in Positive blood culture
    88275-3 Streptococcus pneumoniae gryB gene [Presence] by Probe in Positive blood culture

name: Invasive Pneumococcal Disease (Tests for Streptococcus pneumoniae in Specimen from Normally Sterile Site by Culture and Identification Method)
